languages.text: "Боюсь, у нас нет другого выбора, кроме как биться. То, что спрятано на этом мире, угрожает миллионам жизней, за которые я отвечаю. Ради них я сокрушу любого соперника... Если, конечно, вы все не отступите без боя".

"I am afraid we have no choice but to fight. What is hidden on this world imperils the millions of lives for which I am responsible. For their sake, I will crush any opponent... unless you all retreat without a fight."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, у нас нет другого выбора, кроме как биться. То, что спрятано на этом мире, угрожает миллионам жизней, за которые я отвечаю. Ради них я сокрушу любого соперника... Если, конечно, вы все не отступите без боя".

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid we have no choice but to fight. What is hidden on this world threatens the millions of lives I am responsible for. For their sake, I will crush any opponent, unless you all retreat without a fight."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid we have no choice but to fight. What is hidden on this world imperils the millions of lives for which I am responsible. For their sake, I will crush any opponent... unless you all retreat without a fight."

languages.text: « Je crains que nous n'ayons d'autre choix que de nous battre. Ce qui est caché dans ce monde met en péril les millions de vies sous ma responsabilité. Pour leur salut, j'écraserai tout adversaire qui se dressera devant moi, à moins que vous renonciez au combat et battiez en retraite. »
languages.original_text: "I am afraid we have no choice but to fight. What is hidden on this world imperils the millions of lives for which I am responsible. For their sake, I will crush any opponent... unless you all retreat without a fight."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que nous n'ayons pas d'autre choix que de nous battre. Ce qui est caché dans ce monde met en péril les millions de vies sous ma responsabilité. Pour leur salut, j'écraserai tout adversaire qui se dressera devant moi, à moins que vous renonciez au combat et battiez en retraite. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «Me temo que estamos condenad{mf|o|a}s a luchar. Lo que hay oculto en este mundo hace peligrar los millones de vidas de los que soy responsable. Por el bien de mi gente, acabaré con cualquiera... a no ser que alguien se retire sin luchar».
languages.original_text: "I am afraid we have no choice but to fight. What is hidden on this world imperils the millions of lives for which I am responsible. For their sake, I will crush any opponent... unless you all retreat without a fight."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que estamos condenad{mf|o|a}s a luchar. Lo que hay oculto en este mundo hace peligrar los millones de vidas de los que soy responsable. Por el bien de mi gente, acabaré con cualquiera que no se retire sin luchar».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “恐怕我们别无选择，只能战斗。这个世界隐藏的东西，会威胁到我的王朝几亿人的性命。除非你们不战而退，否则，为了我的臣民……我愿意粉碎一切敌人。”
languages.original_text: "I am afraid we have no choice but to fight. What is hidden on this world imperils the millions of lives for which I am responsible. For their sake, I will crush any opponent... unless you all retreat without a fight."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕我们别无选择，只能战斗。这个世界隐藏的东西，会威胁到我的王朝几亿人的性命。除非你们不战而退，否则为了我的臣民，我愿意粉碎一切敌人。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「戦うしかないかもしれないことが心配だ。この世界に隠されていることは、私が責任を負っている何百万もの命を危険にさらす。彼らのためにも、お前たちが戦わずに撤退しない限り、私はどんな相手でも打ち砕こう」
languages.original_text: "I am afraid we have no choice but to fight. What is hidden on this world imperils the millions of lives for which I am responsible. For their sake, I will crush any opponent... unless you all retreat without a fight."

traits.locale_text: 「戦うしかないかもしれないことが心配だ。この世界に隠されていることは、私が責任を負っている何百万もの命を危険にさらす。彼らのためにも、お前たちが戦わずに撤退しない限り、私はどんな相手でも打ち砕こう」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, wir haben keine andere Wahl, als zu kämpfen. Was auf dieser Welt verborgen ist, gefährdet Millionen von Leben, für die ich verantwortlich bin. Für sie vernichte ich jeden Gegner ... es sei denn, Ihr zieht Euch alle kampflos zurück."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid we have no choice but to fight. What is hidden on this world imperils the millions of lives for which I am responsible. For their sake, I will crush any opponent... unless you all retreat without a fight."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, wir haben keine andere Wahl, als zu kämpfen. Was auf dieser Welt verborgen ist, gefährdet Millionen von Leben, für die ich verantwortlich bin. Für sie vernichte ich jeden Gegner, es sei denn, Ihr zieht Euch alle kampflos zurück."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Maalesef savaşmaktan başka şansımız yok. Bu dünyada gizlenen şey, sorumlu olduğum milyonlarca hayatı riske atıyor. Onların iyiliği için tüm rakiplerimi ezer geçerim... Herkes dövüşmeden çekilmeye karar verirse başka."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid we have no choice but to fight. What is hidden on this world imperils the millions of lives for which I am responsible. For their sake, I will crush any opponent... unless you all retreat without a fight."
